sentences.en: ‘You are an idiot, ’ he tells them.
sentences.cn: ‘你确实是傻瓜，’他对他们说。

sentences.en: "You must think I'm a real idiot."
sentences.cn: “你一定觉得我简直是个白痴。”

sentences.en: Are you an idiot?
sentences.cn: 你是一个白痴吗？

sentences.en: Custer was an idiot and a brute and he deserved his fate.
sentences.cn: 卡斯特是个白痴，是个残暴的家伙，他罪有应得。

sentences.en: Do you take me for an idiot?
sentences.cn: 你以为我是白痴吗？

sentences.en: He was a blithering idiot .
sentences.cn: 他是个十足的傻瓜。

sentences.en: Idiot! You could have told me!
sentences.cn: 蠢货！你本应该告诉我！

sentences.en: It was all your fault, you idiot.
sentences.cn: 全是你的错，你这笨蛋。

sentences.en: Reader, suppose you were an idiot. And suppose you were a member of Congress. But I repeat myself.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的读者，假设你是一个白痴。再假设你是一名国会成员。不过我的话说重复了。

sentences.en: She always makes a mess of things; she is an idiot!
sentences.cn: 她总是把事情弄糟, 真是个大笨蛋!

sentences.en: She is a positive idiot.
sentences.cn: 她完全是个白痴.

sentences.en: That idiot porter again knocked on my door!
sentences.cn: 那个白痴行李工又来敲我的门了！

sentences.en: That man's a right idiot!
sentences.cn: 那个男子完全是个白痴.

sentences.en: The original script was written with the idiot box in mind.
sentences.cn: 剧本当初就是为电视而写的。

sentences.en: Well, sir, he said you were an idiot.
sentences.cn: 嗯， 先生，他说您是一个十足的白痴。

sentences.en: When I lost my passport, I felt such an idiot.
sentences.cn: 我丢了护照时觉得自己像个大傻瓜。

sentences.en: You are an idiot.
sentences.cn: 你是一个白痴。

sentences.en: You are behaving like a perfect idiot.
sentences.cn: 你表现得像个十足的白痴.

sentences.en: You conceited idiot.
sentences.cn: 你这个自命不凡的蠢货。

sentences.en: You should have done that yesterday you idiot!
sentences.cn: 你本该昨天把它做完的，你这个白痴！

sentences.en: You're an idiot!
sentences.cn: 你是个白痴！

trans.tran_en: someone who is mentally ill or has a very low level of intelligence
